comments.comments_text: This is really unlucky! Alex Sandro (Juventus) attempted to clear the ball away after the opposition’s corner kick into the box, but instead miskicked the clearance and put it into his own net, specifically into the bottom left corner. He won't enjoy watching the highlights later.
